game.name: Game of Adventure
game.description:
We all get excited by the thrill and entertainment offered by a huge world of adventure games for boys. Today we have come up with a brand new adventure challenge where fun possibilities are limitless. Give Game of Adventure a try and learn it has today become a favorite of players of all ages! We are damn sure that you will also fall in love with it and surely invite your friend and families to explore the happy hours hidden in the gameplay of this cute game.  
Your objective in this one of the finest platform games for kids is to help your character to run, jump and land safely on the platforms while avoiding the obstacles. The platform is full of obstacles like crow, cockroaches and other dangerous creatures who will try to stop his way. You have 3 lives and have a mission to collect 3 keys. Make sure to collect as much stars as you can to complete each level with the highest possible score. Do not take your enemies lightly as they are very fast to hurt you. 
Make a jump on them to earn points to improve your score in this one of the best html5 adventure games! Play like a true adventurer to complete all six levels! We are invited to check out more platform games on our website where you do not need to install any other app or software to get the best fun out of the online gaming world. Good luck to help the character to complete his adventure online where no download required!
